name: Last Tale
description: For a whole year the monkey rules the world, but the moment came when she needed to leave. The monkey did not want to part with her throne, and then she decided that if no one celebrates the new year, next year will not come. Therefore, she decided to spoil all the holiday.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows  7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Graphics: 256 mb Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Graphics: 1024 mb Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
